name: Dying Dice
description:
This is an old remake of a game i made for a game jam a while

-- HOW TO PLAY --
  1. Roll The Dice
  2. Pick Your Options (Attack, Heal, Talk, Dodge)
  3. Defeat The Enemy
  4. Ez Kill
-- INFO --

This game took me 1 month to make so yeah, and if this game gets alot of attention i will make an update and finish this game
